be_a_partnerContent.paragraph1: myly is building a network of partners that understand the education market in their geography. Partners are willing to explore their networks, build new connections and ensure that the schools they pitch to, need and benefit from myly.
be_a_partnerContent.heading2: If you are looking to build an annual income business, you need the myly Partner program
be_a_partnerContent.paragraph31: myly Partner Program allows you to build a stable annually recurring income for your business. Under the Partner program, we provide you complete training on the product, how to sell and handle tough questions from schools. We provide you company identity which will give your sales a big boost.
be_a_partnerContent.paragraph32: myly provides you support on your initiatives to get more schools! We are there with you at every step. Once you sell, we take care of all on-boarding, training and support for the customer. You move on to the next sale!
be_a_partnerContent.heading3: Fill up the form to get more details from our team.
